titleStmt.title: Govvreis conspiracie a discourse of the vnnaturall and vyle conspiracie attempted against the kings majesties person at Sanct-Iohnstoun vpon Twysday the 5. of August. 1600..
titleStmt.author: Gowrie, John Ruthven, Earl of 1578?-1600.
